paper_abstract: An interleaving method is developed which reduces the size of a tight-binding Hamiltonian matrix for quantum transport simulation based on the non-equilibrium Green's function formalism. Simulation of a 8 nm gate-length double-gate silicon metal-oxide-semiconductor field-effect transistor is then performed by using the interleaving method. (C) 2009 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A computationally cost-effective interleaving method for atomistic non-equilibrium Green's function simulation
